name: Get exercises
description: Проверяет успешное получение информации о задании по exercise_id через GET /api/v1/exercises/{exercise_id}.

steps.name: Check that response status code equals to <HTTPStatus.OK: 200>
Check that length of exercises equals to 1
Check that 'title' equals to 'Serious she great window cold about democratic.'
